title: Reporting people for no reason
body:
So I just had a few games on a new account because I can no longer keep a level 30 account due to it being ridiculously easy to get banned.
Just to support this claim I just had two of these monkey brains on the opposite team twice in a row, who call me bad every game and then they report me after every game, so after two games against them I automatically get chat restrictions and am unable to earn rewards in the Hextech Locker to go for Mastery levels 6 and 7 for about 3 or 4 weeks, which is absolute horse shit because I did nothing wrong. To add to that after the second game in the post game screen, one of them said "I report you every game, honey, I always tell people in team chat to report you." On top of that I had chat restrictions that game so I couldn't have said anything to even warrant a report. 
Summoner names are piicloo and SweetGravy, I hope they eventually fix the discipline system and you two turkeys get roasted for being trolls.

All in all my account is going to be banned again for absolutely no reason, if people can't take what they give out then why do they try to shit talk me and cry when I do it back? Even when I can't I'm punished for it. Please ban people like these two from the servers

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

If what you say is true, then we should be able to help! The [instant feedback](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-#h1q7) system is spot on most of the time, but there have been a few cases where it's slipped up in the past.

+ Before we can do that though, we'll need to see your chat logs. You should have received an email from **Riot** about your ban, you'll be able to find your chat logs there.

 Just post them here, and if everything seems fine, then I'll try my best to sort this out and hopefully reverse your chat restrictions :)

Thanks for letting the community know about this.

> _**As a side note:**_
> I know you want these guys to get punished, but naming and shaming them on the boards isn't the right way to do it. Lots of trolls actually find satisfaction being mentioned on here knowing they ruined someones day.

> Not to mention, naming and shaming is against the boards rules and will get this post taken down, so if you could remove their names ASAP that would really help.

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=h03WnLxr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-23T22:40:00.250+0000)
>
> Hey summoner,
> 
> If what you say is true, then we should be able to help! The [instant feedback](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-#h1q7) system is spot on most of the time, but there have been a few cases where it's slipped up in the past.
> 
> + Before we can do that though, we'll need to see your chat logs. You should have received an email from **Riot** about your ban, you'll be able to find your chat logs there.
> 
>  Just post them here, and if everything seems fine, then I'll try my best to sort this out and hopefully reverse your chat restrictions :)
> 
> Thanks for letting the community know about this.

You can have instant feed back or accuracy. 
It can't do both.

Which is why you have the option to appeal punishments. 
However, like _Telecasterdude_ said, the system is spot on most of the time, and I have only seen two punishments reversed over the two years I have been on the OCE/NA boards. Almost always, there is something the OP is forgetting or purposely omitting to make player support seem like the bad guy.
Yeah it's always funny watching those guys get rekt by riot.
